content: Enter your company or brand name which will be displayed in notifications, exported spreadsheets, and other resources.

comment.text: This translation key is used for the subtitle displayed on mobile view settings page. It informs users that their company or brand name will be shown in various resources.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb form 'أدخلوا' (adkhulu) is in the plural imperative. Since the instruction is directed at the user, a singular imperative form would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أدخل اسم شركتكم أو علامتكم التجارية...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Bildirişlərdə, ixrac edilmiş cədvəllərdə və digər resurslarda görünmək üçün şirkət və ya brend adınızı daxil edin.' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. While technically correct, it lacks the fluidity of a well-translated sentence. The phrase 'görünmək üçün' (to appear for) is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Try something like: 'Bildirişlərdə, ixrac edilən cədvəllərdə və digər mənbələrdə göstərilmək üçün şirkət və ya brendinizin adını daxil edin.' or 'Şirkət və ya brendinizin adını daxil edin ki, o bildirişlərdə, ixrac edilmiş cədvəllərdə və digər mənbələrdə görünə.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'na v oznámeních' is grammatically awkward. It would be more natural to say 'v oznámeních'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zadejte název své společnosti nebo značky, který se bude zobrazovat v oznámeních, exportovaných tabulkách a dalších zdrojích.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "通知、エクスポートされたスプレッドシート、およびその他のリソースに表示される会社名またはブランド名を入力してください" is technically correct, but somewhat stiff and formal for user interface text. It lacks the natural flow of a user-friendly instruction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 通知、エクスポートされたスプレッドシートなど、様々な場所で表示される会社名またはブランド名を入力してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'および' (and) feels slightly formal. It's not inherently wrong, but can be softened for better readability in a UI context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 通知、エクスポートされたスプレッドシートなど、様々な場所で表示される会社名またはブランド名を入力してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "exported spreadsheets" is too literal. A more natural Korean phrasing would be "내보낸 스프레드시트" or "엑셀 스프레드시트". "내보내기한 스프레드시트" sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 알림, 내보낸 스프레드시트 또는 엑셀 스프레드시트 및 기타 리소스에 표시될 회사 또는 브랜드 이름을 입력하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence could benefit from a more natural flow, potentially breaking it into two sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 알림, 내보낸 스프레드시트 및 기타 리소스에 표시될 회사 또는 브랜드 이름을 입력하세요. 이 이름은 회사 또는 브랜드명을 나타냅니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'apresentado' (presented) isn't the most natural translation for 'displayed' in this context. 'Exibido' or 'mostrado' would be better alternatives.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Introduza o nome da sua empresa ou marca que será exibido/mostrado em notificações, folhas de cálculo exportadas e outros recursos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'exported spreadsheets' is translated as 'în foile de calcul exportate'. A more natural Romanian translation would be 'în foi de calcul exportate' or 'în fișiere de calcul exportate'.

The translation is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. "ඇතුළත් කරන්න" is a bit stiff for this context. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'සමාගමේ හෝ වෙළඳ නාමය සඳහන් කරන්න'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ සමාගම හෝ වෙළඳ නාමය සඳහන් කරන්න, එය දැනුම්දීම්, අපනයනය කළ යුතු விரிதாள்පත් සහ අනෙකුත් සම්පත්වල පෙනේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පෙනේ' (pene) which translates to 'appears' or 'is visible' is better than 'පෙන්වනු ලැබේ' (penvanu receive) as it is more common and natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ සමාගම හෝ වෙළඳ නාමය සඳහන් කරන්න, එය දැනුම්දීම්, අපනයනය කළ යුතු விரிதாள்පත් සහ අනෙකුත් සම්පත්වල පෙනේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'експортованим' is spelled incorrectly. It should be 'експортираним'.

The word 'obaveštenjima' is a valid word but could be improved for clarity and flow. It is the locative case of 'obaveštenje' (notification). Consider using a more direct translation for better understanding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Unesite ime vaše kompanije ili brenda koje će biti prikazano u notifikacijama, eksportovanim tabelama i drugim resursima.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'gösterilecek şirket veya marka adınızı girin' is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'Enter your company or brand name...' should ideally convey a more user-friendly tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lütfen şirket veya markanızın adını girin. Bu ad, bildirimlerde, dışa aktarılan tablolar ve diğer kaynaklarda görüntülenecektir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'which will be displayed' is too literal and sounds awkward in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nhập tên công ty hoặc thương hiệu của bạn để hiển thị trong thông báo, bảng tính xuất khẩu và các tài nguyên khác.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'bảng tính được xuất' should be 'bảng tính xuất khẩu' for better readability and adherence to standard Vietnamese terminology.

The translation '该名称将显示在通知邮件、导出表格和其他相关资源中' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Chinese. '通知邮件' can be shortened to '通知' as notifications generally don't specify a 'mail'. Also, '其他相关资源' is broad. A more direct translation that captures the intent would be beneficial.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 请输入公司或品牌名称，该名称将显示在通知、导出表格及其他资源中。
